Click here to join the ThunderDex subreddit! üòÅ Check out the cool features planned for 2024 Features & plans for %s in 2024 Upcoming ThunderDex Features ThunderDex was initially conceived in 2023.
I was a frequent user of the War Thunder Wiki and got tired of using it on my browser.
With 10+ years of coding knowledge, I developed this app in a few months and decided to release it to everyone for FREE!

I really hope you enjoy the app! - HiFii How do I contribute? ThunderDex Contributors Tdikristof_ on Discord (Hungarian translations) Theslimyboi on Discord (Lithuanian translations)
Donate with Google Pay Thank you for considering a donation!

Send the payment to mbqonxda@gmail.com Open Google Pay Copy Email address Google Pay not installed! Launching Google Play Store‚Ä¶ com.google.android.apps.nbu.paisa.user market://details?id=com.google.android.apps.nbu.paisa.user Copied Google Pay Email mbqonxda@gmail.com

Hello and thank you for using ThunderDex.

The BEST War Thunder Wikipedia client for Android.

Please, consider donating if you are enjoying the app... a LOT of work goes into this free app.

You can donate by going into the settings of the app and clicking on the PayPal option.

-HiFii Add extra customization options (vehicle image size, etc)

Filter vehicles by rank instead of alphabetically

Add option to choose how vehicles are filtered

Improvements to the vehicle image viewer

Add an option to download selected vehicle images

Add more translations

Once enough languages are added, create a language chooser option

Even more improvements to loading and performance

Adding more information and user requested information too

Add a wallpaper section with a download ability!! (from the war thunder Wikipedia wallpaper site)
Changelog
